name: Total Zombie Lockdown - Idle Zombie Shooter
name_original: Total Zombie Lockdown - Idle Zombie Shooter
description:
You were given an order to enforce martial law after a recent chemical outbreak. Upon entering the city, you notice civilians are infected and have become Zombies!

You receive a new mission, Find the Lab where the outbreak happened and capture the vaccine. 

In this tactical idle zombie shooter game, you play as a soldier in a hazmat suit traveling through the city. This game is easy to play but tough to master as zombies group up, become tougher and posses different behaviors as time goes on. Slay them by upgrading your gear, collecting gold, unlocking achievements and much more. 

Start your Mission now Soldier, the clock is ticking!

- Total Zombie Lockdown TZL

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you own an Andriod Device please consider playing through the Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pattabhi.tzl

Note: I'm currently working on Porting the game over to Mac , Linux and WEB(HTML).
